mapper.select: select * from Essays where author_id = (select user_id from Users where username = #{username})
select * from Essays where category_id = (select category_id from categories where category_name = #{category})
mapper.insert: insert into Essays(content, abs, title, author_id, category_id, published, createTime, updateTime, cover_photo) values (#{content}, #{abs}, #{title}, #{author_id}, #{category_id}, #{published}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{cover_photo})
